segments.text: What is this big box at the front door ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . I don't know what to do . I joined this club a long time ago and I didn't read the fine print .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you get yourself into ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't realize that I have to buy something from them every six months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what's in the box ? A fridge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a curio cabinet . The only thing is I don't even own those kinds of little keepsakes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess you'll read the fine print next time , won't you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't rub it in . Where am I going to put this huge thing ?
segments.speaker: S2
